content: Several self-emptying robot vacuum deals are up at Amazon ahead of the Oct. 8 Prime Big Deal Days kickoff, including the Roomba Combo j5+ and Narwal Freo.
summary: Several self-emptying robot vacuum deals are up at Amazon ahead of the Oct. 8 Prime Big Deal Days kickoff, including the Roomba Combo j5+ and Narwal Freo.

title: Echo Dot vs. Echo Pop: Which Amazon device is right for you?
content: Amazon offers a lineup of smart speakers, with Echo Dot and Echo Pop being two of the most compact. We compare them to determine which is more worth it.
summary: Amazon offers a lineup of smart speakers, with Echo Dot and Echo Pop being two of the most compact. We compare them to determine which is more worth it.

title: Netflix's 'No Good Deeds' teaser has a stacked cast and a murderous house sale
content: Netflix has dropped its teaser for "No Good Deed", Liz Feldman's new dark comedy about a couple trying to sell their LA home.
summary: Netflix has dropped its teaser for "No Good Deed", Liz Feldman's new dark comedy about a couple trying to sell their LA home.
